CustomField.formula: IF($User.UIThemeDisplayed <> 'Theme4t', CASE(TEXT(CustomerSegment__c), 'GOLD', IMAGE('/resource/Gold', "low"), 'PLATINUM', IMAGE('/resource/Platinum', "low"), 'PURPURA', IMAGE('/resource/Purple', "low"), 'SILVER', IMAGE('/resource/Silver', "low"), IMAGE('/resource/VSegment', "low") ), CASE(TEXT(CustomerSegment__c), 'GOLD', IMAGE('/resource/GoldMobile', "low"), 'PLATINUM', IMAGE('/resource/PlatinumMobile', "low"), 'PURPURA', IMAGE('/resource/PurpleMobile', "low"), 'SILVER', IMAGE('/resource/SilverMobile', "low"), IMAGE('/resource/VSegmentMobile', "low") ) )
CustomField.label: Tale
